title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 261.3 - Exclusions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 261.3 - Exclusions

State Regulations
(a) The following
establishments, businesses and operations are excluded from coverage under this

Part: (1)

Establishments covered by Part 273
of this Title. (2)

Those businesses
operating subject to Federal or State meat and poultry inspection laws and/or
the rules and regulations promulgated thereunder. (3)

Those establishments now or in the future
to be covered by specific rules and regulations promulgated pursuant to the

Agriculture and Markets Law of the State of New York, including but not limited
to the following Parts of this Title: Parts 16, 32, 36, 240, 256, 258, 270 and
275. (b) The
commissioner, however, may promulgate and adopt special or specific rules and
regulations when he or she believes it necessary to cover or control the
operations excluded by the provisions of subdivision (a) of this
section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
261.3

Adopted

New

York State Register March 6, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 10, eff. 3/6/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
